User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account within the FaustApp application, primarily for authentication purposes.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account (matches Firebase Auth UID).

Member.title: Member
Member.description: Represents detailed profile information for a team member.

userId.description: Foreign key linking to the User entity.

location.description: Location or address of the member.

gender.description: Gender of the member or team association.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user authentication data. Accessible only by admins or the authenticated user.
/users/{userId}.rules: allow read: if request.auth.uid == userId || get(/databases/$(database)/documents/users/$(request.auth.uid)).data.role == 'admin'; allow write: if request.auth.uid == userId;

/members/{memberId}.description: Stores user profile data. Accessible by admins or the owning user.
/members/{memberId}.rules: allow read: if request.auth.uid == memberId || get(/databases/$(database)/documents/users/$(request.auth.uid)).data.role == 'admin'; allow write: if request.auth.uid == memberId;
